To show compatibility with tidy workflows we will use magrittr pipe operator
```{r setup}
library("BaseSet")
```

```{r}
relations <- data.frame(sets = c(rep("A", 5), "B"),
                        elements = letters[seq_len(6)],
                        fuzzy = runif(6))
a <- tidySet(relations)
a %>% 
  union("A", "B", "C", keep = TRUE) %>% 
  intersection("B", "C", "D", keep = TRUE) %>%
  set_size()
```
